description: Handicare Group AB is a holding company, which engages in the provision of mobility solutions in the accessibility and patient handling markets. The company is headquartered in Stockholm, Stockholm.  The firm develops, designs, manufactures and distributes manual and powered solutions for disabled and elderly people. The Company’s product portfolio includes straight and curved stairlifts, wheelchairs, rollators and mobility scooters, as well as standard and customized seating and positioning systems. The Company’s activities are organized into five strategic business units: Mobility, Accessibility; Patient handling; Vehicle adaptations; and, in Norway, Medical consumables and technical equipment. The firm operates as a subsidiary of Sunrise Medical. The Company’s subsidiaries include Handicare GmbH, Handicare Stairlifts BV, Handicare A/S and Handicare BV. The firm operates subsidiaries in Austria, Belgium, the Netherlands and Denmark.
naics: Navigational, Measuring, Electromedical, and Control Instruments Manufacturing
name: Handicare Group AB
